content: नीराज्(निस्-राज्) {%<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To cause to shine, illuminate, make brilliant, adorn, irradiate; दिव्यास्त्रस्फुरदुग्रदीधितिशिखानीराजितज्यं धनुः <ls>U. 6. 18</ls>; नीराजयंति भूपालाः पादपीठांतभूतलं <ls>Prab. 2</ls>; <ls>Śi. 17. 17.</ls> {@--2@} To perform the ceremony called नीराजन (<ab>q. v.</ab> below) over a person or thing (wave lights before one as a mark of respect or by way of worship); नानायोधसमाकीर्णो नीराजितहयद्विपः <ls>Kām. 4. 66.</ls>
